alert.note: Alert for Bottineau (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 16 at 2:10PM CDT until further notice by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in North Dakota... Souris River near Westhope affecting Bottineau County. Souris River near Towner affecting McHenry County. Souris River near Bantry affecting McHenry County. .Snow melt and recent rainfall is making its way through the Souris River system and is expected to produce minor flooding in the Towner, Westhope, and Bantry areas. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Souris River near Westhope. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 1414.0 feet, Water is almost valley-wide. The area flooded is grass covered and no buildings are affected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:00 PM CDT Monday the stage was 1414.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 1:00 PM CDT Monday was 1414.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to remain steady above flood stage at 1414.9 feet. - Flood stage is 1414.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 1413.4 feet on 11/11/2019. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
